title: Chantal Van Den Broek-Blaak to Link up with SD Worx for First Camp since Giving Birth
content:
The former world champion had her first child in May and is one of a growing number of riders making use of the Women's WorldTour maternity leave clause.

Read the full article at Chantal Van Den Broek-Blaak to Link up with SD Worx for First Camp since Giving Birth on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
